snippet: To promote the third season of "Boardwalk Empire" in Manhattan, the show's marketers leveraged Uber, the mobile taxi-hailing app, to arrange rides in vintage cars for the show's fans.
abstract: To promote the third season of "Boardwalk Empire" in Manhattan, the show's marketers leveraged Uber, the mobile taxi-hailing app, to arrange rides in vintage cars for the show's fans.

headline.main: Hitching an Old-Fashioned Ride the Newfangled Way
